p: The transcript levels of EgFAD8 in leaf and mesocarp at five different developmental stages were determined by RT-qPCR using Î²-actin as an internal control. The results showed that the transcript level of EgFAD8 in mesocarp was quite flat during ripening with a slight increase at the beginning (from P1 to P2, Fig 2). Interestingly, the expression level of EgFAD8 in mature leaves was at least twice that in mescoarp ( Fig 2).
